newsitem.title: USA: Stewart files for 4.75 mln share offer.
newsitem.headline: Stewart files for 4.75 mln share offer.

text.p: Stewart Enterprises Inc filed Friday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up to 4.75 million Class A common shares.
Of the total amount, the company will offer 4.25 million shares and 500,000 will be sold by a current shareholder.
Underwriters for the offerng are Bear Stearns & Co Inc, Goldman Sachs & Co, ABN Amro Chicago Corp and Johnson Rice & Co. They have an over-allotment option of up to 712,500 shares.
The New Orleans based funeral home and cemetery operator said proceeds from the sale, an estimated $175 million, will be used initially to reduce outstanding debt.
After the offering, the company will have 44.75 million Class A common shares outstanding and 1,777,510 Class B shares outstanding, according to the SEC filing.
